alert.note: Alert for Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 5:53PM CST until December 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Morris County. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to midnight CST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds from 30 to 39 mph and/or gusts from 45 to 57 mph are likely. Steps should be taken to secure any lawn furniture or light weight objects and use extra caution when driving.
